scripts.clear: rm -rf backend/node_modules; rm -rf backend/dist; rm -rf frontend/node_modules
scripts.install-packages: npm install --prefix backend; melluinbtest=$?; npm install --prefix frontend; exit $melluinbtest && exit $?
scripts.test: npm run --prefix backend test; melluinbtest=$?; npm run --prefix frontend test; exit $melluinbtest && exit $?
scripts.lint: npm run --prefix backend lint; melluinbtest=$?; npm run --prefix frontend lint; exit $melluinbtest && exit $?
